title: Home Page Load and Content Display
description: Verify that the home page loads within 2 seconds and all main sections (HeroSection, ServicesOverview, HowItWorks, WhyChooseUs, Testimonials, CTASection) render properly with correct content.

steps.description: Navigate to the home page ('/')
Verify the page loads within 2 seconds
Check hero section with CTA buttons is displayed
Check services overview cards are visible with accurate service summaries
Validate how it works 3-step process section appears
Verify trust indicators and customer testimonials are displayed
Ensure call-to-action section is visible and interactive

title: Services Page Filtering and Service Details Display
description: Verify services page loads correctly, displays all cleaning services, allows filtering, and shows detailed info on selected service.

steps.description: Navigate to the services page ('/services')
Ensure all available cleaning services are fetched and displayed from Supabase
Use filter controls to filter services by criteria (e.g., service type or price)
Verify that filtered services list updates accordingly
Select a service to view detailed information
Check that service detail includes price and full description

title: Booking Wizard: Successful Booking Flow
description: Verify successful completion of the four-step booking wizard with correct input validations, price calculation, backend integration, and email notification.

steps.description: Navigate to booking page ('/booking')
Step 1: Select a cleaning service
Confirm service selection is valid and reflected in price calculation
Step 2: Select a valid future date and time in the calendar component
Verify date and time cannot be in the past and validation errors are shown if attempted
Step 3: Enter valid customer details (name, email, phone)
Confirm all form fields validate inputs correctly and display errors for invalid data
Step 4: Review booking details and confirm the booking
Confirm final price calculation matches base price and property size calculation
Verify booking record is created in Supabase database
Check email confirmation is sent to the customer via Resend

title: Booking Wizard: Input Validation and Error Handling
description: Verify the booking wizard prevents progression on invalid input including empty fields, invalid emails, and past dates.

steps.description: Navigate to booking page ('/booking')
Attempt to proceed without selecting a service
Verify error message prompts to select a service
Select a service then choose a past date
Verify validation prevents progressing and displays error for past date
Enter incomplete or invalid customer details (e.g., invalid email format, empty required fields)
Confirm relevant error messages appear and block next step

title: User Authentication: Login, Logout, and Protected Routes
description: Verify user login and logout functionality using Supabase Auth, session management, and access restrictions to protected routes like dashboard and admin dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page or trigger login flow
Input valid user credentials and submit
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard
Access protected routes '/dashboard' and '/admin'
Verify dashboard is accessible to authenticated user
Verify admin dashboard is inaccessible to non-admin users with proper redirect or error
Trigger logout
Verify user session is terminated and access to protected routes is denied

title: User Dashboard Booking Management
description: Verify that an authenticated user can view upcoming and past bookings, cancel bookings, and see booking status updates.

steps.description: Login as a standard user and navigate to user dashboard ('/dashboard')
Verify upcoming and past bookings are displayed correctly, reflecting accurate booking statuses
Select an upcoming booking and trigger cancellation
Confirm booking status updates to canceled both visually and in backend
Verify email notification is sent for booking cancellation

title: Admin Dashboard - Booking and Message Management with Email Notifications
description: Verify that admin users can view, update booking statuses, manage contact messages, and that updates trigger appropriate email notifications.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to admin dashboard ('/admin')
Ensure admin overview statistics load and reflect current system state
View all bookings and update their status (e.g., confirmed, completed, canceled)
Verify status updates reflect in UI and database
Confirm email notifications are sent to users on booking status changes
View contact messages and update their statuses
Ensure message status updates persist and trigger notification emails if applicable

title: Contact Form Validation and Email Notification
description: Verify that the contact form on the contact page validates inputs, stores messages in Supabase, and sends confirmation emails.

steps.description: Navigate to contact page ('/contact')
Fill in contact form fields with valid inputs and submit
Verify form validates subject selection, email format, and required fields
Confirm message is stored in Supabase 'contact_messages' table
Check confirmation email is sent to the user via Resend

title: Responsive Design - Mobile, Tablet, Desktop Layout Consistency
description: Verify that the entire app layout and navigation adapt correctly to mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes with accessible ARIA attributes.

steps.description: Load the app on devices or emulators simulating mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes
Verify navigation menus adapt (e.g., mobile menu appearance)
Ensure all UI components resize and rearrange appropriately without content overflow or distortion
Check that ARIA attributes are present and enable keyboard navigation and screen reader accessibility
Navigate through pages and key features on each device size
Confirm animations and transitions remain smooth on all screen sizes

title: Accessibility Compliance Test for WCAG 2.1 AA
description: Perform comprehensive accessibility checks ensuring compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA including keyboard usability and ARIA labels.

steps.description: Use keyboard navigation to tab through all interactive elements on key pages (home, booking wizard, dashboard, admin)
Confirm all interactive elements are reachable and usable via keyboard alone
In a screen reader, navigate through the app and verify ARIA labels, roles, and landmarks are descriptive and accurate
Verify color contrast ratios meet WCAG 2.1 AA minimums
Ensure error messages and validation feedback are announced or perceptible to assistive technologies
